For Sale are (4) Piedmont Factory 42. The forgotten scarce back of late. Prices include shipping with tracking. All prices are negotiable.

Heinie Wagner Bat on Right Shoulder PSA 5-    $700**SOLD**
Jeff Sweeney New York                     PSA 1.5- $340**SOLD**
Fred Snodgrass Catching                   PSA 1.5(MK)- $325
Ed Konetchy Glove Near Ground        PSA 2(MK)- $340

PM's are answered in order received and will take it trumps ongoing negotiations.
Nice cards Adam.  This back is significantly tougher than it gets credit for.
